FreeFlyer速 is a commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) software application for space mission design, analysis, and operations. The FreeFlyer速 Runtime API is a tool allowing users to interface directly with the FreeFlyer速 engine from other programming languages.

To use the API, import the `RuntimeApiEngine` class from the `freeflyer_runtime_api` package. Documentation and examples can by found in the FreeFlyer速 installation.
